member.name: IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE
member.summary: Defines values for the possible media states.

member.name: IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE.IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Indicates that the interface does not know the media state.

member.name: IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE.IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE_INFORMATIONAL_MASK
member.summary: Reports information (but not errors) about the media state.

member.name: IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE.IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE_OVERWRITE_ONLY
member.summary: Write operations can occur on used portions of the disc.

summary.para: Media is randomly writable. This indicates that a single session can be written to this disc.
summary.div: Note This value is deprecated and superseded by IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE_OVERWRITE_ONLY.

member.name: IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE.IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE_BLANK
member.summary: Media has never been used, or has been erased.

member.name: IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE.IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE_FINAL_SESSION
member.summary: Media can have only one additional session added to it, or the media does not support multiple sessions.

member.name: IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE.IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE_DAMAGED
member.summary: Media is not usable by this interface. The media might require an erase or other recovery.

member.name: IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE.IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE_ERASE_REQUIRED
member.summary: Media must be erased prior to use by this interface.

member.name: IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE.IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE_NON_EMPTY_SESSION
member.summary: Media has a partially written last session, which is not supported by this interface.

member.name: IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE.IMAPI_FORMAT2_DATA_MEDIA_STATE_UNSUPPORTED_MEDIA
member.summary: Media is not supported by this interface.
